ui.title: Life Balance Wheel
ui.subtitle: How is your life going? Drag the slices to reflect your current state.
ui.dockTip: Bottom dock: switch language, download, or copy your wheel.
ui.tip: Tip: Click and drag on the wheel to paint your life balance.
ui.copyUnsupported: Browser doesn't support direct image copy. Please use Download instead.

usageGuide: No need to be even: different seasons of life have different priorities
Look for gaps: the lowest area is often where stress comes from
Make small shifts: pick 1–2 areas and set small, doable actions

mission.title: Mission (Purpose / Direction)
mission.description:
Do you have a clear direction for your life?
Do your current actions feel aligned with your values and long-term goals?

body.title: Body (Health / Energy)
body.description:
Physical health, fitness, routines, diet, and sleep.
Includes exercise habits and whether you feel energized.

mind.title: Mind (Learning / Mental Strength)
mind.description:
Quality of thinking, focus, learning, and resilience.
Are you learning consistently and managing stress and emotions well?

soul.title: Soul (Inner Peace / Meaning)
soul.description:
Inner peace, meaning, beliefs, and spirituality (not necessarily religion).
Do you feel grounded and connected to yourself?

fun.title: Fun (Leisure / Enjoyment)
fun.description:
Joy, relaxation, hobbies, and entertainment.
Do you allow yourself to enjoy life—not just responsibilities?

romance.title: Romance (Intimacy / Partnership)
romance.description:
Quality of your romantic or intimate connection.
Includes communication, trust, companionship, and emotional fulfillment.

family.title: Family
family.description:
Your relationship with your family of origin or the family you build.
Support, connection quality, and balanced responsibilities.

friends.title: Friends (Social Life)
friends.description:
The depth and breadth of your social circle.
Do you have honest, supportive relationships?

growth.title: Growth (Personal Development)
growth.description:
Personal growth, skill-building, and stepping outside your comfort zone.
Beyond career: character and perspective growth too.

money.title: Money (Financial Security)
money.description:
Income, savings, investing, security, and control over money.
Not just how much you earn—whether you feel safe and have choices.
